saying: There's no such thing as a safe secret.
description: Tasha is a snooty squirrel from the Animal Crossing series. She made her debut in Doubutsu no Mori e+, which would be her only appearance in any Animal Crossing series media until she made a reappearance in Animal Crossing: New Leaf - Welcome amiibo. This was later followed by an appearance in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp, as one of several villagers unlockable through Blathers's Treasure Trek.
